body_html: Same issue here. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/data/tfexample_decoder.py L435 reports an error if the decoded format is not tf.uint8. In this case, decode_jpeg returns tf.uint8 while decode_image could return tf.uint16 for example if I decode uint16 PNG, and tf.cond does not different dtype of true_fn and false_fn.
body_text: Same issue here. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/data/tfexample_decoder.py L435 reports an error if the decoded format is not tf.uint8. In this case, decode_jpeg returns tf.uint8 while decode_image could return tf.uint16 for example if I decode uint16 PNG, and tf.cond does not different dtype of true_fn and false_fn.
body: Same issue here. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/data/tfexample_decoder.py L435 reports an error if the decoded format is not tf.uint8. In this case, decode_jpeg returns tf.uint8 while decode_image could return tf.uint16 for example if I decode uint16 PNG, and tf.cond does not different dtype of true_fn and false_fn.
